title: SCP-5555

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may transfer your attribute to any other SCP.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If anyone publically claims that you are SCP, that night you will swap roles with them. A claim is definied as a definite statement that you are SCP. For example: "Name might be SCP" "Name is suspicious" would not count. "Name is SCP" "I think Name is SCP" would count. Original goals are kept intact.
- If you transfer your attribute to another SCP and they swap, your attribute comes back to you.

desc:
Post 4382
*What do you mean you didn't make 5555 fifthist? Are you joking?*
